content:
"name": "Oatmeal with berries",
 "ingredients": [
 { "name": "Oatmeal", "amount": 1, "unit": "cup", "calories": 150 },
 { "name": "Water", "amount": 1.5, "unit": "cups", "calories": 0 },
 { "name": "Frozen berries", "amount": 0.5, "unit": "cup", "calories": 40 }
 ],
 "calories": 190,
 "preparation": [
 "1. In a small saucepan, bring the water to a boil.",
 "2. Stir in the oatmeal and cook for 1-2 minutes, until it thickens.",
 "3. Stir in the frozen berries and cook for another minute.",
 "4. Serve hot and enjoy!"
 ]

adkust the proportions so that the total calorie ammount is 800
